name: Wrist Curl, Dumbbells
how_to_perform:
1. Start by sitting on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands hanging straight down from your sides, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward (towards you).

2. Keeping your upper arms still and only bending at the wrists, slowly curl your hands up towards your shoulders.

3. Focus on squeezing your biceps muscles as you curl your hands upwards.

4. Lower your hands back down to the starting position, keeping control throughout the movement.

5. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Wrist Curls with dumbbells are an isolation exercise that targets the flexor muscles of the forearm.
